transcript:
Customer: [Music]

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Ha sir IndiaMART se bol raha hu sir Abdul. Ji sir, waha se bol raha hu. Ha bolo.

Customer: Ha boliye. Dekhiye IndiaMART se bol raha hu sir Abdul bol raha hu sir. Kaisa ho sir?

Executive: Ha boliye. Ha bas badhiya.

Executive: To main yahi keh raha tha sir. Ha Nakib sir kya aaj sir aapne buylead use kiya tha sir?

Customer: Buylead use kiya lekin sir kuch response nahi mil raha sir sahi hai aisa yaar.

Executive: Kya kya bol rahe hain buyer aapko?

Customer: Are lead uthti hai lead uthane ke baad call karte to bhi aisa aata hai uske baad fir call karte to bola ke party bolti hai nahi lena sir.

Executive: Sir aap kya bol rahe hain sir fir se repeat karenge sir?

Customer: Kya hua?

Executive: Hello. Ha sir. Main ye keh raha hu ki jo buylead aapke paas aap use kar rahe hain. Usme matlab jab aap buyer se baat karte hain to kya response mil raha hai sir aapko?

Customer: Sahi sir response nahi milta hai ye teen mahina se aisa ho raha hai sir. Jab se payment payment badhao tab se aisa ho raha hai.

Executive: Ek baar sir mobile application IndiaMART open karenge sir?

Executive: Main aapko kuch buylead batata hu sir usko consume.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Abhi main sir main kya bolta hu abhi main filhal mere ko dupehar mein aap call kar do dupehar mein main free hota hu. Kya free hote?

Executive: Ek kaam karo na sir meri baat suno refund aap karwa do na sir payment mera yaar.

Executive: Aap mujhe free hoke call kijiye sir fir aapse discussion karta hu main bhai. Nahi aisa nahi bolta sir meri baat suno main bolta hu ki refund karwa do payment mera sir.

Executive: Sir ji dekhiye refund sir aise nahi hota jab tak aap service nahi use karenge sir aap proper tarike se service use kiye sir kyu nahi banega. Suniye na.

Customer: Are khali to sahi hai sir. Yaar teen mahina se to service use kar raha hu sir. Teen mahine se to service use kar raha hu sir.

Executive: Sir aap use kar rahe hain na payment. Aap meri baat suno aap meri baat suno aap mere ko karwa do refund. Meri baat suno aap refund karwa do sir mere ko. Maine bola to sahi yaar aapko kya kya kya ke main thak gaya hu sir.

Executive: Sir last month bhi jo aap dekhoge na aapne sirf 41 buylead use kiya hai aapko 68 buylead milta hai month ka sir. Aap aise hi.

Customer: Are lead aise hi jata hai kya nahi use karta lead aise hi jata hai sir. Lead uthaunga to sir kuch response milega to lead uthaunga nahi yaar lead uthane ka man hi nahi karta sir. Same sir aap same lead ki buylead purchase karo na sir kyu nahi response milega aapko. Abhi main check kar raha hu sir aap lead related buylead purchase kar rahe hain to kya response milega bataiye sir. Aap same lead.

Customer: Refund karwa do mere ko meri baat suno aap company mein meri baat suno aap company mein baat karke return karwa do sir.

Executive: Sir dekho return jo hai na pehle aap sir return aise nahi hota hai sir ki aap. Are yaar tum tumhari jha jha karte ho sir yaar meri baat to sunte bhi nahi ho yaar tum.

Customer: Tum tumhari baatein kar kar karte ho sir meri baat to yaar tum sunte nahi ho yaar. Nahi mere ko refund karwa do sir nahi karna mere ko yaar.

Customer: Tum tumhari baat yaar ghum ghumake wahi baat karte ho yaar.

Executive: Main aapko keh raha hu sir ki ek baar jo hai na. Nahi meri baat suno sir meri baat suno. Aap mere ko refund karwa do sir mere ko nahi karna sir business.

Executive: Sir ji jab tak aap service. Nahi sir aap ghuma fira ke wahi baat karte ho yaar wahi aise hi use karo wahi use karo yaar. Aap ek hi baat karte ho sir milta to nahi yaar kuch bhi milta nahi hai sir.

Executive: Sir milega na sir aap aise nahi.

Customer: Nahi aap mere ko refund karwa sir nahi karna mere ko business nahi karna aap mere ko refund. Aisa nahi bolta sir aap mere ko refund karwa do nahi karna sir main thak gaya hu yaar.

Customer: Aap bolo to aapke aage haath jodu main.

Executive: Nahi nahi sir haath jodne. Tum are sir yaar tum yaar. Aisa nahi yaar tum samajh nahi aap kuch kuch samajhne ko tayar nahi ho yaar tum.

Executive: Sir ji samajhne ko hum tayar hain aap. Nahi meri baat suno main company mein baat karta hu mere ko refund karwa do. Meri baat suno sir mere ko nahi karna business aap mere ko refund karwa do main aisa bol raha hu sir aapko.

Executive: Aap sir ek ek kaam karo sir ek baar jo hai na aapse discussion kar lete hain aapko jo jo main bol raha hu na waise aap buylead use karo. Are nahi karna sir kya yaar lambi lete ho aap mere ko nahi karna sir aap mere ko refund karwa do sir. Sir ji aap direct negative ho jayenge nahi karna nahi karna aisa nahi hoga sir aap business to aap. Mere ko refund chahiye sir mere ko kuch bhi nahi karna mere ko refund chahiye payment sir thik hai.

Executive: Ek baat bataiye Nakib sir aap isliye nahi karna chah rahe hain ki aapko business nahi mil raha hai yahi reason hai na?

Customer: Ha mere ko nahi karna sir bol to diya yaar fir ek ek baat karte ho yaar aap.

Executive: Sir mere ko refund karwa do sir barobar mere ko nahi karna are sir baat suno meri aap sun nahi rahe ho baat mere ko refund karwa do nahi karna business main aisa bol raha hu aapko.

Executive: Aap thodi ek sath rahiye sir aapko kyu nahi karna. Nahi mere ko refund kar main koi baat nahi sunni aapki mere ko refund karwa do sir. Sir aap sunenge nahi to kaise solution dunga sir aap refund chala do refund aise nahi sir aap.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting proper response from buyleads.

- Wants a refund for the subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to open IndiaMART application.

- Executive tried to explain about buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription
